jewelry.jewel: Hand of the Magemage hand at will
Aegis of Recovery+2 save for recurring effect. if wearer is below 0 HP then cure 2d8+3 and turn to dust
Brooch of Shieldingimmune to magic missile
Ring of Acrobaticsgrants wearer +5 Acrobatics
Ring of Athlethicsgrants wearer +5 Athlethics
Ring of Healinggrants wearer +5 Heal
Ring of Thieverygrants wearer +5 Finesse
Ring of Climbinggrants wearer +5 Athletics
Ring of Swimgrants wearer 20ft swim ability
Ring of Clergy 1grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 1
Ring of Protection +1grants wearer +1 deflection AC
Ring of Silence1/day creates a silence spell CL=15 within 10ft rad centered, wearer can still cast a spell without being affected
Ring of Wizardry 1grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 1
Ring of Spell Knowledge 1ring has a spell from SL 1 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell
Amulet of Natural Armor +1grants +1 Natural armor to wearer
Scarab of Golembanedetects golems within 60ft, ignores damage reduction of all golems
Ring of Ferocious Actionring has 5 charges per day, for 5 rounds can ignore staggered condition
Mind Sentinel Medallion+2 save vs mind affecting
Scholar's Ringallows wearer to understand a written text from one of the racial languages, also grants +5 to Society for that race
Amulet of Mighty Fists +1grants +1 TH and damage with unarmed damage
Amulet of Uncanny Defenseimproved EXISTING Uncanny Dodge to Improved Uncanny Dodge, if has Improved Uncanny Dodge then increases level by 4
Ring of Sustenancewearer can gain resting benefits with 4 hours of rest
Periapt of Healthimmune to normal and magical diseases
Ring of Antivenom1/day can cast neutralize poison only to self
Ring of Clergy 2grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 2
Amulet of Natural Armor +2grants +2 Natural armor to wearer
Hand of Glorytakes amulet place and allows to use one more ring. 1/day daylight and invisibility
Ring of Mind Shieldingimmune to mind reading or alignment detection spells/effects
Ring of Wizardry 2grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 2
Gravewatch Pendantundead have -2 attack penalty to wearer, incorporeal undead have penalty -4
Amulet of Proof Against Petrificationany effect that turns wearer to stone makes him staggered for d6 R if allow save, for 1min if unallow save. if was staggered then this ability does not work
Ring of Strength Sapping1/day unarmed attack deals d4+1 Strength damage to target unless Fort DC 20, if save fails ring wearer gains +2 Strength for a minute
Ring of Mystic ElementCL for element is increased by 1
Ring of Spell Knowledge 2ring has a spell from SL 2 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell
Ring of Protection +2grants wearer +2 deflection AC
Necklace of Adaptationallows to breathe always and immune to gas attacks
Ring of Force Shieldforms a shield from force effect in front of wearer, grants +2 shield AC
Amulet of Spell Cunningallows a memorizer spellcaster to prepare 3SL additional spells per day
Ring of Foe Focusdesignate a target (single) and against that target has +2 AC and saves, can change target if target is dead or once in a minute
Ring of Curingall healing spells cast by wearer has +2 CL
Frost Fist Amuletunarmed deal d6 cold damage and unarmed treated cold iron
Guardian Gorgetgrants +2 armor AC and also "Light Fortification" ability. once until triggered can out a blast glyph that deal damage to attacker only on hit wearer
Medallion of Thoughtsas spell Detect Thoughts
Steelhand Circle1/day negates the effects of a critical hit or sneak attack. hit becomes normal hit instead of critical or sneak attack
Periapt of Protection from Curses3/day can reroll a curse save to take the second
Ring of Element, Minorgrants 10 resistance to element, stacks with other sources
Ring of Chameleon Powergrants wearer +10 Stealth and at will spell "Disguise Self"
Forge Fist Amuletunarmed deal d6 fire damage and unarmed treated adamantine

Ring of Balorif wearer dies while wearing this ring spell casts an explosion within 20ft range dealing HD d8 (half fire, half bludgeoning) to anyone caught in area by blowing up the corpse of wearer, no SR, Reflex/2 with DC 15 + wearer HD/2, this ring is not destroyed during the explosion. (former) wearer can only be resurrected by Wish + True Resurrection
Periapt of Wound Closurealways stabilizes wearer if negative HP, double natural healing, cures bleeding attacks immediately

Ring of Jailorthis ring is a pair, jailor wears one and a prisoner other. prisoner cannot remove the ring and only jailor can do (or Wish spell after casting CL20 remove curse). jailor can continuously see status of prisoner and also his position/location as "Status" spell
Amulet of Mighty Fists +2grants +2 TH and damage with unarmed damage
Necklace of Ki Serenityconsider Monk levels +4 for ki damage
Ring of Swarming StabsSneak Attack/Skirmish level is considered +2 for improving such abilities, can exceed character level

Brooch of Amber Sparksabsorb electric damage wearer subject with 20 limit and total 50 per day. wearer can release the electric damage within 10 minutes dealing d6 per 5 electric stored as shocking grasp spell

Symbol of Sanguine Protectionwearer damage self d6 and cured after 1 day for creating his holy blood. when blood put in pendant and an undead attacks for blood drain attack, takes 4d6 positive energy damage and sickened for d4 R if DC 16 Will fail.
Ring of Wizardry 3grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 3
Ring of Clergy 3grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 3
Ring of Spell Knowledge 3ring has a spell from SL 3 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell
Ring of Protection +3grants wearer +3 deflection AC
Amulet of Natural Armor +3grants +3 Natural armor to wearer
Ring of Inner Fortitude, Minorring reduces ability damage by 2 and drain by 1 (will drop from multiple abilities if that occurs from same source)
Bone Ringring has 3 charges, for every negative level attack made to target, 1 charge is expended. charges replenished daily
Ring of Invisibilityon activation std action wearer becomes invisible
Ring of Divine Masterygrants wearer +1 CL for divine spells
Ampoule of False Bloodpermanently changes sorcerer bloodline effects including spells/abilities etc
Ring of Arcane Masterygrants wearer +1 CL for arcane spells
Amulet of Magecraftonly universalits wizard and must use this item as arcane bond. select a school, any memorized spell from a SL can be swaped to another known same school spell
Dragonfoe Amuletignore damage reduction of dragon, any spell cast to a dragon roll spell resistance twice and take better. against dragon's breath considered to have evasion ability
Amulet of Spell Masteryallows a memorizer spellcaster to prepare 6SL additional spells per day
Ring of Evasiongrants wearer Evasion ability if wearer has no armor or light armored
Periapt of Proof Against Poisonimmune to poison
Ring of Element, Majorgrants 20 resistance to element, stacks with other sources
Ring of Spell Storing, Minorstores a spell caster can cast up to 3 SL (can be any combination), activating spells are free action
Amulet of Natural Armor +4grants +4 Natural armor to wearer
Ring of Wizardry 4grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 4
Ring of Protection +4grants wearer +4 deflection AC
Ring of Spell Knowledge 4ring has a spell from SL 4 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell
Ring of Clergy 4grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 4
Amulet of Mighty Fists +3grants +3 TH and damage with unarmed damage
Scarab of Protectionspell resistance 23, absorbs 12 energy drain, death, negative energy attack. once 12 charge depleted item destroyed
Ring of Freedom of Movementwearer is under continuous effect of freedom of movement spell
Ring of Inner Fortitude, Majorring reduces ability damage by 4 and drain by 2 (will drop from multiple abilities if that occurs from same source)
Ring of Element, Greatergrants 30 resistance to element, stacks with other sources

Ring of Delayed Doomring has 9 charges, whenever a spell is cast on wearer and wearer fails its save, as immediate action wearer might opt to delay the effect whatever it is. each round one charge is spent until the hostile spell caster is defeated/killed or spell dispelled or wearer stops using charges for the effect. when nine charges are depleted, ring is useless. only a spell of targeted effect can be delayed (not area, touch or ray)
Amulet of Natural Armor +5grants +5 Natural armor to wearer
Ring of Clergy 5grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 5
Ring of Spell Knowledge 5ring has a spell from SL 5 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell
Ring of Wizardry 5grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 5
Ring of Protection +5grants wearer +5 deflection AC
Amulet of Mighty Fists +4grants +4 TH and damage with unarmed damage
Ring of Inner Fortitude, Greaterring reduces ability damage by 6 and drain by 3 (will drop from multiple abilities if that occurs from same source)

Spiritualist's Ringring grants wearer multiple abilities, 3/day speak with death with each 10 minutes, 3/day spectral hand, any weapon held is "Ghost Touch", gains +4 save bonus vs positive or negative energy effects
Ring of Spell Storing, Majorstores a spell caster can cast up to 5 SL (can be any combination), activating spells are free action

Ring of Wizardry 6grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 6
Ring of Telekinesisallows wearer to cast telekinesis spell at will, each use is a std action as supernatural effect
Ring of Regenerationcures wearer 1HP per round. wearer is immune to bleed attacks. if wearer loses any limbs, ring can grow such wounds within a minute
Ring of Elemental Absoptionwearer is immune to the element and also heals self by %50 by any element effect
Ring of Clergy 7grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 7
Ring of Spell Knowledge 7ring has a spell from SL 7 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell

Amulet of Mighty Fists +5grants +5 TH and damage with unarmed damage
Ring of Spell Turning3/day can activate ring power equivalent to spell turning to reflect spell back to caster
Ring of Wishring has a CL20 Wish spell stored in it, wearer can activate the wish ability anytime he wishes as immediate action but ring turns to ashes
Amulet of Planes1/day allows wearer to use Planeshift to another plane (and return back)
Ring of Clergy 8grants 1 more spell slot per day for a divine spell caster to cast up to SL 8
Ring of Spell Knowledge 8ring has a spell from SL 8 in it, any spontaneous arcane spell caster can use the spell in ring as if she knows the spell
Ring of Wizardry 8grants 1 more spell slot per day for a arcane spell caster to cast up to SL 8

trinkets.trinket: Ioun Torchthis is torch without hands
Unguent of Timelessnessif an object was once alive but dead one, preserves the object (corpse)
Silversheenone use coats a weapon to silver for 1hour
Elixir of Hidingexpended on use, +10 Stealth for 1 hour
Elixir of Swimmingexpended on use, grants swim ability with 20ft for 1 hour
Elixir of Tumblingexpended on use, +10 Acrobatics for 1 hour
Elixir of Visionexpended on use, +10 Perception for 1 hour
Elixir of Truthdrinker must tell truth unless Will (mind) 13 for 1 hour
Masterwork Artisan's Tools+3 specific Craft [Armorsmithing, Weaponsmithing, Fletchery, Alchemy, "Custom"] skill
Campfire Beadcan make campfire for 8hour but requires 16hour cooldown
Snapleafexpended on use, activate invisibility plus feather fall as immediate action
Iron Roperope becomes iron at command
Assassin's Dustwhen sprinkled on a corpse, corpse becomes to dust like Disintegrate spell
Dust of Emulationexpended on use, Impersonation on magical item activation is auto success for 1 hour

Wand of Divine Spell [SL1,CL1]a wand of Divine spell of SL1, contains 5d10 charges

Concealing Pocketswen on a cloth to create pocket, +5 Finesse for concealing a magic item

Eyes of Eaglegrants +5 Perception
Candle of Truthcasts Zone of Truth and lasts for 1 hour

Belt of Mighty Constitution +2+2 Constitution

Circlet of Persuasion+3 to Influence and Society
Helm of Comprehend Languagesunderstands any language in spoken and written language
Slippers of Spider Climbingcan climb to walls and ceiling without hands with 20ft speed, very slippery surfaces are impossible. can be used 10 minutes per day
Physician's Spectaclescontinuous Detect Poison and Diagnose Disease spell
Incense of Meditationdivine spellcaster maximize all spells if meditate with this, 1 use
Sheath of Bladestealthwhen weapon is sheathed, makes weapon invisible
Ioun Stone (Defense)+1 insight AC
Grappler's Maskenables wearer to bullrush or grapple without attack opportunity
Polymorphic Pouchallows polymorphed (wildshape) holder to access an item from backpack
Spellguard Bracersspellcaster has +2 concentration when casting defensively. 3/day can roll 2 concentration and take better
Jingasa of the Fortunate Soldier+1 luck AC, 1/day negate a critical hit to a normal hit.
Sorcerer's Robe3/day a sorcerer can use the bloodline 1st level ability when he casts a spell
Scabbard of Stanchingprotects from any bleed attack if DC is 15 or less
Bracers of Archery, Lessergrants proficiency to any bow, +1 TH and damage rolls

Eversmoking Bottlecreates smoke of 10ft cube per round up to 100ft cube, in wind disperses 4R or in strong wind 1R
Wind Fan1/day as spell Gust of Wind
Boots of Striding and Springing+10ft base land move speed, +5 Athletics and Acrobatics
Headband of Unshakeable Resolve+2 Wisdom, 3/day reduce fear level by 1 (panicked>>frightened>>shaken>>negated entirely)
Pipes of Hauntingincreases DC of fear based bardic performance by 2
Singing Bell of Strikingany ki users (monk) can deal cold iron or silver damage instead of magic, until rest
Eyes of Keen Sightlowlight vision or range doubled if already has, +2 Perception
Magnetist's Gloves3/day can disarm a metal weapon within 30ft
Treeform Cloak1/day become tree as spell. every hour under sun heal d6 hp

Bonebreaker Gauntlets1/day with melee natural attack deal injury to target unless 14 Will save. if save fail deal 6 ability damage to any physical stat. this damage heal 1 per day or healing spells like heal, regenerate, restoration or curse removing spells
Horn of Battle Clarityif blown on surprise round, all allies within 60ft are not flat-footed even not acted yet
Martyr's Tearowner store 3d6 HP by wounding self and transfer the gem to any. can use the gem to cure
Cloak of the Scuttling Rat5min/day with 1 min use every case, polymorph into a dire rat
Pipes of Inspireincreases DC of heroism based bardic performance by 2
Gloves of Swimming and Climbing+9 Athletics
Headband of Deathless Devotion+2 save bonus vs continuous save spells/effects (poison, dominate person etc...)
Horn of Goodness/Evil1/day as spell magic circle against good/evil
Eagle Capeaffected as feather fall spell. 1/day can transform into an eagle allowing 80ft fly and +5 perception for 10minutes
Cape of Bravadowhen held a part in one hand grants +1 insight AC, +5 Influence to feint.

Mirror of Guarding Reflectionsowner can create image (as spell mirror image) 3/day, against any any attacker immediately form an image. if image is hit it is destroyed but next time attacker makes a TH or save, rolls twice and takes worse
Bottle of Shadowshas 4 charge, summon a shadow to do master's bidding for 1R each charge
Phylactery of the Shepherd3/day can watch any ally as spell status within 30ft. also allows wearer to use Channel Energy or Faithful Touch from range as swift action to the target
Mask of the Krenshar3/day all within 100ft who see must DC 13 will (mind) or frightened (HD6-) or shaken (HD6+) for d4 R, this is an illusion so trueseeing is unaffected
Jaunt Boots3/day when make 5ft move action then move 15ft instead
Bottle of Airallows breathing continuously
One-way Windowa small frame when put on a solid wall, can show other side without seeing from other part.
Manual of War1/day for 24hour a FIGHTER can exchange a known feat with another he can attain
Boots of Levitationat will Levitate on self
Belt of Superior Maneuvers +23/day gives +2 to chosen maneuver (CMB or CMD) for 1 R

Iron Cobra Gauntlet3/day for 1 hour animates a snake to do master's bidding
Earth Root Bootsfor every round stay in same place, gains +1 CMD for moving target away (+10 max)
Duelist's Vambraces+1 deflection AC with two weapon fighting. 1/round can ignore offhand attack roll penalty by 2
Chalice of Poison Weeping1/day neutralize poison from a poisoned target and chalice will have poison with the operation, it will have -4 DC
Insignia of Valorif owner kills a target with smite then can use channel energy as swift action
Needles of Fleshgraving1/day can transform an object to tattoo (lasting a week), tattoo owner can transform item back as std action
Werewhistle1/day any lycanthrope within 30 feet to make a DC 17 Will save or be forced back into its humanoid form for the next 24 hours
Shirt of Immolationany creature/target attacks wearer with natural attacks suffer d6 +10 fire damage, shirt burns for 10 R per day

Cocoon Cloakwhen wearer fall asleep, cloak makes a cocoon and cocoon has +4 natural AC, %25 immune to critical hits until wearer wakes up
Pauldrons of the Bullmake 2 rolls for bullrush and take better (no limit), +2 CMD for bullrush

Medusa Mask+4 save vs visual effects, gaze attack, illusions. 1/day make a target within 30ft gazed petrified for 1 min unless DC 15 Fort
Doomharpbard can have Dirge of Doom at 60ft range

Hourglass of Last Chances5 R per day non consecutive, on a target within 30ft suspends states: blinded, confused, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned, sickened, and stunned also enjoys freed of movement as spell
Malleable Symbolcan change channel energy shape to one of 10ft burst to any within 30ft / 60ft line / 30ft cone

Phylactery of Positive Channellingadds +2d6 to negative Channel Energy
